reviews.name: Do Kien Trung
reviews.review: Lovely place for family at weekend. Nice and simple decoration. The up side down ice cream is Dairy Queen's significant product. The taste is good. It is not too sweat so the children can enjoy it. The menu has few of choices, therefore the customer just can choose among 6 - 8 options. The special one, mango cream with steamed glutinous rice, is usually out of order. The staff is nice and well-trained üëçüëçüëç

reviews.name: Michael Leander
reviews.review: Decent mall. Good service at ground floor shops.  Great decor outside by entrance

reviews.name: Phuong Linh
reviews.review: I even find this mall more interesting than vincom plaza. On 3rd floor there are timezone playground (small but new an super clean as all kids have to wear socks and wash hands before entering play areas), indoor trampoline park and cgv. My kids enjoyed here very much. The mall is not big but enough to shop around

reviews.name: Binh Tri Tran
reviews.review: Very crowded especially at weekend. Good price. Located at city center.

reviews.name: Hwang Yun
reviews.review: If u need a break from the heat in Can Tho this is A good spot. There is also and all you can eat Korean BBQ for around $10usd on the top level. Good bang for your buck!!!

reviews.name: Connie Lin
reviews.review: Very delicious hot pot restaurant and staff there are so friendly. I can‚Äôt wait to visit again in the future.

reviews.name: D Sundance
reviews.review: Great mall with a selection of food places and cafes to choose from, a book/stationery store, clothes outlets, shoes, watches, electrical products, accessories, perfumes, and a large co op mart to get food and everyday essentials.

reviews.name: Sebastian R
reviews.review: Large shopping centre with food court. Shops range from supermarkets to coffee shops and book shops.

reviews.name: Hoai Nam Le
reviews.review: Parking service is not very convenient. Good variety of choise. Place for entertainment for families and friends

reviews.name: Dennis Nguyen
reviews.review: Good place to do some shopping..price are fix...dont have to trry to negotiate the price..good for travelers

reviews.name: The Green Dragon - R·ªìng Xanh
reviews.review: A really nice cinema with kind and friendly staff, the place was modern and clean with a vintage movie aesthetic, for the paintings on the wall on your way to the screens, the cinema screen overall was Good, and I liked how they have the Love box option at the top of the screen for couples, it was nice to sit with your partner, while you watched the film. Overall a great cinema to visit.

reviews.name: Mark Wilber (LoudMusic)
reviews.review: This is the main shopping mall in town. They have a food court upstairs and a nice movie theater on the top floor. You can also find Western style pizza restaurants and other things from Western cuisine on the food court floor. Also there's a kids area up stairs where they can play in a ball pit and rent kids activities.

reviews.name: griizzlerhops
reviews.review: Theres an Okay selection of food, there isnt much vietnamese food tho which is okay. My only complaint is the parking which is God awful, it's hard to park in a tiny space available. The Arcade,CGV,Kids play area, and trampoline park in the top floor is what makes this mall real cool. Had a great time here, Shopping is okay but the floor with all the play Features is what takes the cake. Had a great time here.

reviews.name: john ‚ÄúOptionworld 2000‚Äù smith
reviews.review: Clean, fun and safe. But it is only servicing any foods from other countries but Vietnamese. Some Western foods are together with rice for customer. For example, Korean or Japanese buffers, and fried chicken or hamburger with choices in rice. Places for children, women and business outfits. Market stuff for everything to everyone. Highly recomended, from shopping to household things, as well as different foods for unique tasks, looks and funs. Thus, best choices in diffirent cultures, foods and travels.

reviews.name: Nh∆∞ V√µ
reviews.review: A non- luxury mall with many stores for foods, clothes, restaurants and a cinema. There is also a beer club in the first floor. The supermarket market can be very crowded and it's a long queue for check out in peak time.

reviews.name: Th√°i H√≤a Trung
reviews.review: Good place for general shopping and other activities as reading books, playing games, watching movies, various of food and beverage options.  There are minor issues as the walkways around the places are not well designed, stores so far don't have good marketing strategies so stores closing and new one opening are common here.

reviews.name: Nghiem Dang
reviews.review: Nice place for a night walk

reviews.name: Kim Ng
reviews.review:
Mall √† 3 √©tages : ground level with food market, several stands for cosmetics, luggages, shoes and clothes.
The 1st floor is dedicated to clothes and the upper level of the market (essentially dishes, more clothes, detergents, soaps...).
The 2nd floor has restaurants, buffets, a Jollibee and Lotteria (fried chicken fast foods), a Tocotoco (bubbleteas) and a bookstore.
The last floor has a cinema.

If you buy stuffs inside, you can have them delivered at your place.

reviews.name: Kris Taylor
reviews.review: Great for coop shopping, sells everything

reviews.name: Nicolas Devos
reviews.review: Very good Japanese food

reviews.name: Trunglong Huynh
reviews.review: Sense city is a center to shoping. It contain co.opmart - a supermarket with many things and price is low or normal. In another part, it contain many showrooms and stores sell jewelries, clothers,  sneakers and sport tools, beer, coffee and drinks,... CGV cinema in the third floor of this building.

reviews.name: Robert Chase
reviews.review: Very nice shopping center.  Has some good eateries as well.  Kids loved Jump and running around on the trampolines

reviews.name: John B
reviews.review: An air-conditioned oasis in the heart of Can Tho city. Sense City mall has plenty of shopping options where you can pick up supplies you might be missing from home plus a good food court on the the 3rd floor.

reviews.name: Kha Huynh
reviews.review: Not so many thing to enjoy. Mainly they come here for Supper market. Ground has some other brands for jewelries.

reviews.name: Dam Tran Thanh
reviews.review: Located at the center of the city. This shopping mall is very convenient for local and travelling people with all kind of foods, consumer goods, etc...

reviews.name: Hung Ngo
reviews.review: Nice place and convenient position in the city center. There's CGV cinema, Jolibee, Nike, Baskin Robin and lots of stuff for daily need

reviews.name: Tim
reviews.review: One of the main shopping malls in Can Tho. Nice and big and in the supermarket they sell Hasfarm flowers.

reviews.name: Margreet van Veluw
reviews.review: Nice and clean shoppingmall, various shops including a big supermarket and a coffee shop. Also a cinema and multiple fastfood restaurants. Nice to hang out for an afternoon.

reviews.name: Vincent ‚Äúplantbasedvince‚Äù Nguyen
reviews.review: Huge new shopping mall in C·∫ßn Th∆°. I didn't see this 4 years ago when I visited. It's worth a visit lots of unique stores and great food court.

reviews.name: I am grateful
reviews.review: Got one stop shop. The supermarket is good. The food court and game zone are good. City central location

reviews.name: Good sign
reviews.review: Beautiful and clean.

reviews.name: Karunen Pillay Vencatasawmy
reviews.review: Has a cool arts shop and the cinema is nice. We didn't see much more.

reviews.name: Ai Fu CHIN
reviews.review: Clean, modern and premium goods.

reviews.name: Ginny Vo
reviews.review: Nice complex shopping mall in Can Tho City, Vietnam.

reviews.name: David Sinclair
reviews.review: Cinema,store, shopping complex. The coop supermarket is on two levels and has most things tourists would want!

reviews.name: Keith Crane
reviews.review: Good Co op store to stock up, but restaurant offerings are a bit limited to fast food.

reviews.name: Phuong Loan Nguyen
reviews.review: Restaurants here are good with delicious food except we're still hungry after our meal. (it's not enough)

reviews.name: My Huynh
reviews.review: Great mall to buy things, has several restaurants for you to choose and it's right in the heart of CT city

reviews.name: TU·∫§N L√ÇM TH√ÄNH
reviews.review: Good

reviews.name: SG Genius
reviews.review: Parking is terrible and a coop mart supermarket with a non respectable act on their customers, they uses cable tie to lockup your bags to prevent stealing..what an insulting act...üò†üò†üò†üò†üò† ‚Ä¶

reviews.name: Nick Nguyen
reviews.review: In the heart of the city, quite crowded at weekends and holidays. Got pizza restaurant, ice-creams, cafe, supermarket, movie theatre,...

reviews.name: Shikha Bhan
reviews.review: Great dairy queen. They also have burberry masks, if anyone is looking.

reviews.name: Nev
reviews.review: Airconditioned shoopping centre, with large department store on the lower floors and shops and restaurants on the upper level.

reviews.name: Chau Tieu Ngoc
reviews.review: Nothing special. Is a department store as others. Convenient place to do simple shopping.

reviews.name: Mark Nussy
reviews.review: Nice shopping centre.  Great variety of items.

reviews.name: Heinrich ‚ÄúHein‚Äù Lombard
reviews.review: Best shopping mall in Can Tho.

reviews.name: Ty Tran
reviews.review: Ok

reviews.name: Frederick Then
reviews.review: Quite a well contain mall. All the usual favourites are in the mall. Of cos...highland coffee.

reviews.name: Haegeli Harry
reviews.review: Afternoon nice Place  to go  cafe Shopping   wi fi  Outdoor seating

reviews.name: Duc Nguyen Tan Chu
reviews.review: Nice mart to pass by and pick up goods and stuffs. Price is reasonable.

reviews.name: Alec Cox
reviews.review: Always really nice and clean. Great selection for everything you may want.

reviews.name: Thu·∫≠n Kay
reviews.review: Great place for entertainment

reviews.name: Kh·∫£i Nguy·ªÖn (Jason)
reviews.review: It's a good place for shopping, they got all stuff that you need.

reviews.name: Troy Nguyen
reviews.review: Convenient. Coopmart has good service, limited range of products.

reviews.name: Yongsuk Cho
reviews.review: Nice shopping mall. I can spend time whole day in here.

reviews.name: rob blood
reviews.review: Nice mall will many different places to shop clothes restaurants

reviews.name: James Fu
reviews.review: You can but lots of stuff here with the cheaper price. You must go there if you come to Can tho !

reviews.name: Kent Phan
reviews.review: Popular destination for public buyers coz it offers wide range of groceries and food.

reviews.name: Giang Phan
reviews.review: Biggest mall in Can Tho, there are some nice shops inside.

reviews.name: Raymond Chong
reviews.review: A lot stuffs available to buy at Can Tho
